channel.title: Adding towns to servers
channel.description:
I have been looking around the forum and I have failed to find any examples or information on this matter I am just wandering how do you make your own towns. I know you got to do some global spawning and all but does anyone know how to make your own towns from scratch if not could they post a guide if possible or if not anything that would help.
Hope I posted this in the right forum!
Cheers people!

item.title: Adding towns to servers
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

I admit that but I quote:

Quote from: surfer25 on April 21, 2007, 05:52:24 AM No because adding global items makes the server lagg... but adding a whole town full shifty Depends on your Internet Connection and your Computer. ;-) Not everything is based on just how much Global Objects you have or stuff like that, if you have a good Computer that most likely means that you will hav a great, non-laggy Server. Smiley Like mine (ZaroScape

Read full topic

item.title: Adding towns to servers
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“EwfsPrince, post:16, topic:82783”]I agree but I don’t want to go through the process of having to construct evreytime my server goes down.[/quote]Just 1 reason I don’t like Construction on Servers: lag.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding towns to servers
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“EwfsPrince, post:14, topic:82783”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=121621.msg1196634#msg1196634 date=1177229978]
Good idea with the monkey floor, not like it is really a place to build a town, but it would look cool still. Good luck!
[/quote]

Thanks. I will need all the good luck to pull a stunt like this off since I am a newbie coder I have been coing in other areas just not this kind. I just had a thought just now would it be possible to log constuction? Like if I build a room and stuff in ::constuction is there a way I could get it logged.

eg: Prince spawned west wall at -2 etc.
Just thinking all I would have to do is change to cood and add it to global objects.[/quote]I think it would be better to log if people use Construction outside of the Construction area, so that you can check it daily and punish people who did it.

Read full topic

Thanks. I will need all the good luck to pull a stunt like this off since I am a newbie coder I have been coing in other areas just not this kind. I just had a thought just now would it be possible to log constuction? Like if I build a room and stuff in ::constuction is there a way I could get it logged.

eg: Prince spawned west wall at -2 etc.
Just thinking all I would have to do is change to cood and add it to global objects.

item.title: Adding towns to servers
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Right, mine is fairly good. Is there a tut for doing this kind of spawning or if someone could help me out that would be gr8! I am thinking of building in that monkey place. (Where the bamboo floor is) Because it’s flat and should be eaiser to build on.

Ty all for the helpful info!

Cheers!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding towns to servers
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“surfer25, post:6, topic:82783”]No because adding global items makes the server lagg… but adding a whole town full :|[/quote]Depends on your Internet Connection and your Computer. Not everything is based on just how much Global Objects you have or stuff like that, if you have a good Computer that most likely means that you will hav a great, non-laggy Server. Like mine (ZaroScape).
